speaker: narrator
dialog: With one final attack, you strike down the sketchy zookeeper with all your might.

speaker: narrator
dialog: You wipe the sweat from your brow and gaze down at your fallen coworker.

speaker: narrator
dialog: "Don't ever show your face around these parts again," you hiss at your coworker,

speaker: narrator
dialog: "Or you'll have me to deal with!"

speaker: narrator
dialog: Congratulations! You've beaten the boss, and saved the animals!

speaker: narrator
dialog: We don't have anything to give you to prove your triumph, except for the knowledge that you did it. Good job!
